Package scripting

Contains a scripting framework by which different languages can interface to Java.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Function A general interface for functions which take at most one argument
ScriptingEngine The common interface for all scripting engines used by ScriptingEngineManager and ScriptBottleneck
 

Class Summary
Binding A class which is used by JLWidget implementations to communicate with their internal state.
Coercer A class which facilitates getting objects into the type you want them in.
JavaFunction  
PythonEngine  
ScriptBottleneck  
ScriptGenerator Generates Python code which recreates a copy of a given object (if that object's type is supported) when executed.
ScriptingEngineManager  
 

Package scripting Description

Contains a scripting framework by which different languages can interface to Java.
